sentences.en: All I got was a measly £5.
sentences.cn: 我只得到了区区五英镑。

sentences.en: He gave us measly little portions of cake.
sentences.cn: 他给了我们少得可怜的一点蛋糕.

sentences.en: I asked. " Just take this measly 10 cents an hour and smile? "
sentences.cn: 我问, “ 接受这可怜兮兮的每小时10美分然后还要微笑 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: It had grown only four measly shoots!
sentences.cn: 大蒜头上还只得三四茎嫩芽!

sentences.en: The average British bathroom measures a measly 3.5 square metres.
sentences.cn: 英国人的卫生间平均只有区区3.5平方米。
多么小气的生日礼物哇!

words.tran_cn: 患麻疹的；极少的；低贱的

trans.tran_cn: 患麻疹的，少得可怜的，微不足道的。
trans.tran_en: very small and disappointing in size, quantity, or value – used to show disapproval
